import{LOCALHOST}from"../utils/Constants";import{getToken}from"./Login";export function ProfileApi(id){var uri="".concat(LOCALHOST,"/perfil?id=").concat(id);var params={method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(getToken())}};return fetch(uri,params).then(function(response){// eslint-disable-next-line no-throw-literal
if(response.status>=400)throw null;return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}
